configuration.name: underage user (16-17) should be required to fill guardian fields

test-name.value: underage user (16-17) should be required to fill guardian fields

item.itemvalue: Playwright.underage user (16-17) should be required to fill guardian fields
Playwright.underage user (16-17) should be required to fill guardian fields

task.summary:
Add guardian support for underage waitlist entries
Introduce `waitlist_guardians` table and transactional logic for adding guardian details when underage users join the waitlist. Updates include database migrations, UI adjustments for conditional input fields, validation logic, and tests to ensure age-based gating.

Update `waitlist_guardians` to reference `profile_id` instead of `waitlist_id`
Replaced `waitlist_id` with `profile_id` across database schema, relationships, and scripts to align with updated data model. Adjusted related seeding logic and server routes to ensure consistency and maintain functionality.
`feat: add guardian information to views, RLS policy, and UI components`
`feat: add medical_conditions to member management view and members-table`
`feat(stripe): update to API version 2025-04-30, dependencies and improve transaction handling`
feat: implemented invitations list of members

feat: add bulk invite functionality and UI enhancements for waitlist management
- Added `complete_member_registration` SQL function for handling member registration. - Enhanced waitlist table with bulk invite feature using Supabase functions. - Introduced `SendIcon` button for inviting members with tooltips. - Refactored background processing logic for invitations. - Improved state management, query handling, and updates for waitlist invitations.
chore: add database schema and data source configuration files

feat: add invite management and UI enhancements
- Replaced `complete_member_registration` SQL function with API-based invite workflows. - Added resend invitation API and related UI updates for waitlist. - Improved waitlist filtering (`status`). - Updated Stripe API version. - Enhanced IDE configuration and standardized code formatting.

feat: enhance invite workflow and UI; improve IDE config
- Added API-based invite workflows, replacing `complete_member_registration` SQL function. - Introduced resend invitation API and related UI updates for waitlist. - Improved waitlist filtering by `status`. - Updated Stripe API version. - Refined IDE configuration and applied consistent code formatting.
feat: refactor invitation to use invitation id instead of tokens

feat: added migrations for new email invite processing.
It now uses the uuid of the invite as a route and sends an email manually.

feat: added migrations for new email invite processing.
It now uses the uuid of the invite as a route and sends an email manually.
feat: added functions for email processing using a supabase queue.
feat: refactored admin endpoint to add emails to the queue.

Add guardian support for underage waitlist entries
Introduce `waitlist_guardians` table and transactional logic for adding guardian details when underage users join the waitlist. Updates include database migrations, UI adjustments for conditional input fields, validation logic, and tests to ensure age-based gating.

Update `waitlist_guardians` to reference `profile_id` instead of `waitlist_id`
Replaced `waitlist_id` with `profile_id` across database schema, relationships, and scripts to align with updated data model. Adjusted related seeding logic and server routes to ensure consistency and maintain functionality.
`feat: add guardian information to views, RLS policy, and UI components`
`feat: add medical_conditions to member management view and members-table`
`feat(stripe): update to API version 2025-04-30, dependencies and improve transaction handling`
feat: implemented invitations list of members
`chore: add data source meta and schema files for IDE configuration`

feat: add bulk invite functionality and UI enhancements for waitlist management
- Added `complete_member_registration` SQL function for handling member registration. - Enhanced waitlist table with bulk invite feature using Supabase functions. - Introduced `SendIcon` button for inviting members with tooltips. - Refactored background processing logic for invitations. - Improved state management, query handling, and updates for waitlist invitations.
chore: add database schema and data source configuration files

feat: add invite management and UI enhancements
- Replaced `complete_member_registration` SQL function with API-based invite workflows. - Added resend invitation API and related UI updates for waitlist. - Improved waitlist filtering (`status`). - Updated Stripe API version. - Enhanced IDE configuration and standardized code formatting.

feat: enhance invite workflow and UI; improve IDE config
- Added API-based invite workflows, replacing `complete_member_registration` SQL function. - Introduced resend invitation API and related UI updates for waitlist. - Improved waitlist filtering by `status`. - Updated Stripe API version. - Refined IDE configuration and applied consistent code formatting.
feat: refactor invitation to use invitation id instead of tokens

feat: added migrations for new email invite processing.
It now uses the uuid of the invite as a route and sends an email manually.
feat: added functions for email processing using a supabase queue.
feat: refactored admin endpoint to add emails to the queue.
